subhashini jayarathnathamilnaduwe pawathina anarakshitha bhawaya salakillata gena idiriye di ehi pawathwimata niyamitha ayi. pi. el. tharaga sandaha ape krikat kridakayan sahabhagi karawima anumatha nokarana bawa krikat palaka mandalaye lekam nishantha ranathunga mahatha ‘silumina’ta pawasiya.ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wana kisidu shri lankika kridakayakuta thamilnaduwe di tharaga kirimata thama awasara laba nodena bawa thamilnadu maha amathini jayaram jayalalithage prakashayath samanga pasugiyada shri lanka krikat kshethraye unusum wathawaranayak mathu wiya.me pilibandawa wadiduratath adahas dakwu krikat palaka mandalaye lekamwaraya thamilnaduwa hara anikuth pranthawala aarakshawa pilibanda gataluwak nomathi bawa eeththu yanne nam ema pranthawala pawathwena krikat tharagawali sandaha kridakayan sahabhagi karawima gana krikat palaka mandalaye wiruddhathwayak nomathi bawath eheth ehi yama noyama pilibanda thiranaya kridakayan sathu bawath kiya.ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliya sanwidhanaya karanne indiyanu krikat palaka mandalaya bawath eya antharjathika krikat kawunsalaya mangin da anumatha karena heyin shri lanka krikat palaka mandalaya mema sanwidhana samanga gatalu sahagatha thaththwayak athikara ganimata balaporoththu nowana bawath pawasiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

adamsge mema gamana etharam sarthaka nowuye ekalhi rajathanthrika bhashawa wu pransha bhashawa ohuta nohaki wu nisaya. 1778 aprel 1 dina sita 1779 juni 17 thek yuropaye ohu gatha kala kalaya etharam sarthaka nowuyen 1779 agosthu mul bhagaya pamana wana wita ohu nawatha siya gam bim wu brentri walata paminiyeya.
